metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13335 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper group membership validation when deleting a user account in GitLab >=7.12 allows a user to delete own account without deleting/transferring their group.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
